name: Lemon Pepper Pasta with Shrimp
author: Anonymous
summary: Lemon flavor enhances shrimp and pasta in this easy anytime meal.
ingredients: 3 cups uncooked dried cavatappi or fusilli pasta
2 squares Lemon Pepper Saute Express® Saute Starter
1 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled, deveined
1 (6 ounce) package fresh baby spinach leaves
directions: Cook pasta according to package directions
Melt Saute Express® squares in 12-inch nonstick skillet over medium-low heat just until bubbles begin to form
Saute 5-7 minutes or until shrimp turn pink
Add spinach and heat until wilted
Toss in pasta and cheese until coated
